qa_pairs.question: What are the two methods for configuring the Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Verifies the correct methods for configuring the Axess DCU are identified. Answer must mention both HHU and LED panel.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU can be configured either with the Axess HHU or on the DCU LED panel.

qa_pairs.question: What is the part number for the Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit) Mounting Bracket Kit?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Correct part number for the DCU Mounting Bracket Kit.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU mounting bracket kit has part number AXDCUBRKT.

qa_pairs.question: What are the specifications for the communication bus used by the Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Verifies the correct communication protocol. Must include RS-232 Serial ASCII Bus 9600, 8, N, 1.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU uses a RS-232 Serial ASCII Bus 9600, 8, N, 1 for communication.

qa_pairs.question: What are the IECEx and ATEX certifications for the Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Verifies the correct IECEx and ATEX certifications. Must include both certification codes.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU has IECEx Ex ia IIC T4 Ga/Gb and ATEX Ex II 1/2 G Ex ia IIC T4 Ga/Gb certifications.

qa_pairs.question: What is the voltage and capacity of the Lithium Battery Pack used in the Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Verifies the correct voltage and capacity of the battery pack. Answer must include 7.2V and 5Ah.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU uses a 7.2V 5Ah Lithium Battery Pack.

qa_pairs.question: What is the expected battery life of the Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit) when taking readings every 6 hours?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Verifies the battery life and reading frequency. Answer must include '5 years' and 'every 6 hours'.
qa_pairs.answer: The battery life of the Axess DCU is up to 5 years when taking readings every 6 hours.

qa_pairs.question: What is the benefit of the Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit) being compatible with electrical resistance (ER), linear polarization resistance (LPR), and galvanic probes?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Answer must mention ER, LPR, and galvanic probes, and explain that this capability allows changing probe technology without hardware changes.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU can be used with electrical resistance (ER), linear polarization resistance (LPR), and galvanic probes, allowing users to change probe technology without changing hardware.
